publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-440 Lord James Douglas-Hamilton: Appointment of New Cardinal—That the Parliament congratulates the Archbishop of St Andrews and Edinburgh, Keith Patrick O’Brien, on his well-deserved appointment as cardinal and wishes him every good fortune and success. Supported by: David McLetchie*

S2M-440 Appointment of New Cardinal (lodged on 1 October 2003) Stewart Stevenson*, Murdo Fraser*, David Mundell*, Michael Matheson*, Murray Tosh*, Mr David Davidson*, Mr Ted Brocklebank*, Bill Aitken*

S2M-440 Lord James Douglas-Hamilton: Appointment of New Cardinal—That the Parliament congratulates the Archbishop of St Andrews and Edinburgh, Keith Patrick O’Brien, on his well-deserved appointment as cardinal and wishes him every good fortune and success. Supported by: David McLetchie, Stewart Stevenson, Murdo Fraser, David Mundell, Michael Matheson, Murray Tosh, Mr David Davidson, Mr Ted Brocklebank, Bill Aitken, Tricia Marwick*
S2M-440 Appointment of New Cardinal (lodged on 1 October 2003) Mrs Nanette Milne*
S2M-440 Appointment of New Cardinal (lodged on 1 October 2003) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-440 Appointment of New Cardinal (lodged on 1 October 2003) John Swinburne*
S2M-440 Appointment of New Cardinal (lodged on 1 October 2003) Fiona Hyslop*, John Scott*
S2M-440 Appointment of New Cardinal (lodged on 1 October 2003) Michael McMahon*
S2M-440 Appointment of New Cardinal (lodged on 1 October 2003) Elaine Smith*
